Public Remarks: Predevelopment work is done and this lot is ready to build on. Quarry rock was hauled in to create the driveway and building sites for a house and shop.  The building sites were excavated down to a gravel material then built back up and compacted to ensure it was ready for a slab. Municipal sewer and water connections to the lot line are installed and ready for you to hook up. Affordable, ‘almost in the country’ living with town amenities such as garbage/recycling pickup and high-speed internet available.
